Prerequisite(s): Three Surging Shark maneuvers
Range: 30 ft
Target: You
Duration: Instantaneous
Area: 30 ft burst

Description

Full of rage, you summon forth pieces of broken coral reefs and fire them with vengeance at your hated foes. All enemies in range take 6d6 slashing damage and [[2d6]] bleed damage. A Reflex save (DC 17 + initiation modifier) halves the damage and negates the bleed. A DC 15 Heal check can stop this bleeding. This is a supernatural maneuver.

Call of the Deep: The wounds you open are cursed and don't close easily. The bleeding disables any fast healing or regeneration the target has. When healed by magic, the caster needs to make a Caster level check (DC is equal to the Fortitude save + 5) or the bleeding does not stop.
